relation: I recommend GIMP 1.2.5, but that's mainly because I'm used to it. The newer version (2.0.1) looks nicer, but it's just not the same.

A fast, small, compact image viewer that supports a large number of image formats and can convert from one format to another (including batch converting). Also supports view of many multimedia viewing.

textAfterTable: - Mozilla1.7 Web-browser built for 2004, advanced e-mail and newsgroup client, IRC chat client, and HTML editing made simple -- all your Internet needs in one application. Doody The Clown - Advant Browser Try Avant Browser, an upgrade to Internet Explorer. Avant Browser is a fast, stable, user-friendly, versatile multi-window browser. Now, Avant Browser is available in 40 languages. Xcommunicated - Opera Another free alternative to IE. Many people prefer this over IE or Firefox, i prefer Firefox but it's simply your preference. A disadvantage is that the free version is ad-supported. De_Spank ___/Firewalls - ___/Product Name/Link ___/Description ___/Recommended by - Zone Alarm Zonealarm is very well known free-full feature firewall. What i like about it is the program control, it allows you set which programs have access rights to the Internet. It is very good at blocking unwanted incoming and outing traffic.
